attributes.action: To abolish the smoking ban in pubs and clubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Loads of clubs and pubs are going to go out of business if this silly law is allowed to continue. Let the owners decide!  After all, we live in democracy not a dictatorship.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
